sign_in.link_what_is_this: What is this? Is it safe?

multi_factor.form_code_message: Enter the code sent to your email or from your authenticator. Alternatively use a backup code.

authorize.alert_request_permission_message: { name } would like the ability access following data in your RSI Account.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: The service can be read your unique account number, nickname, display name, avatar, and badges.

joined_organizations.title: Joined organization
joined_organizations.description: The service can collect that organization you join. This data is included organization's name, avatar, and banner information that you join.

owned_games.title: Owned games
owned_games.description: The service can check which games you have. This data is included game's id and name.

launch_game.title: Launch game
launch_game.description: Caution The service may launch game using your account data. This data is included your email, session id, and unique token. Please allow only trusted apps for your account secure.
